0.description: Can be applied to any font size.

subtler.description: description, helper, description for selector, description for accordion

base.description: for title, description, label, logo (black), filled text for controls (inputs), title in progress component, autosuggestions,  title inside selector, text inside timer, text for accordion for all states, for checkbox, switcher (except disabled state) etc, primary button (dark mode) for all states

on-dark.description: Text in banners, primary button except disabled state

disabled.description: for disabled and loading states ((transparent button, links, action menu item, Adress Book Card (CTA variant), Filter Button, Option button, Panel, Side menu button, Tab button, Header Menu link, Profile menu item, Quick filer item from Date picker,

feedback-special offer.description: for product card with special offer

cards-auxiliary-active.description: for text card, course group card

base.description: primary button in dark mode for all states, icon color for accordin for accordion, filter button (applied variation)

subtle-disabled.description: icons for secondary, gost, tranparent buttons and links (only dark mode)

subtle.description: icons for secondary, gost, gray tranparent button, gray links, etc

subtler.description: icons in helper, icons in different inputs

primary-shade-1.description: for static icons ( sign up form, feature block)

critical.description: Icon inside error message, Icon inside "File upload"

feedback-warning.description: Icons for notifications, icons next to warning messages

disabled.description: borders for secondary buttons, inputs etc.

feedback-error.description: Checkbox, Masked input, Search, Select, Selector, Radio button, Text Area, Text Input, File Upload,

selected.description: Address Book Card, Side Menu Button, Tab Button, TOC button, Equipment Card, Date picker, Expandable Table

cards-active.description: Hint Block, notification, Tabs static border for desktop, Border for tables

interaction-hover.description: Filter button, Inline Edit, Edit Mode Actions, Ghost button, Primary button (dark mode)

blanket.description: Use for the screen overlay that appears with modal dialogs
